hotel.name: LAVRIS PARADISE HOTEL

images.alt: InterContinental Aphrodite Hills Resort Hotel, Beach, Main New
Intercontinental Aphrodite Hills Hotel, Beach, Main New

hotel.ourOpinion: A unique luxury Resort with plenty of activities and entertainment. For those wanting total relaxation and pampering there is the expertly run Retreat Spa. Children will enjoy hours of fun at the fantastic Children's Play & Activity Zone!
hotel.description: Aphrodite Hills is the first ever fully integrated luxury resort to be opened in Cyprus. Set on a stunning plateau overlooking the crystal waters of the Mediterranean and the Mythical birthplace of the Goddess of Love - Aphrodite, the resort combines a wide choice of the finest accommodation with professional standard 18 hole golf and The Annabel Croft Tennis Academy facilities along with a state of the art spa and gymnasium complex plus children's clubs, horse riding, beach clubs and a whole host of other wide ranging leisure activities. The resort offers a superb Mediterranean lifestyle choice, the chance to be as active or leisurely as you choose, in an idyllic environment created against the stunning backdrop of the Troodos Mountains on one side and magnificent sea views on the other and only 15 minutes from Paphos International airport. The resort also offers a traditional village square complete with shops and a choice of restaurants and bars. The resort is an ideal family choice with superb facilities for the children including a dedicated children's 'Play & Activity' zone within the Pirate's Village Kids' Club with a wide range of activities. Throughout the summer guests are entertained by live and varied family musical entertainment staged at the Olive Courtyard.

hotel.name: Lyttos Beach

images.alt: Lyttos Beach Hotel, Swimming pool night view

hotel.ourOpinion: Located directly on the beach, the Lyttos Beach Hotel offers activities and facilities suitable for all ages. This is a great family hotel that will provide timeless memories for all.
hotel.description: On one of the most beautiful islands in Greece, Crete and within 20 kms distance from the airport of Heraklion, a heavenly garden awaits you in Hersonissos. Just 5 kms from the town, hidden amongst vast, colourful gardens, in an area of 150 acres of palm trees and flowers leading to a 350 metre fully-organised, sandy beach, Lyttos Beach Hotel is unlike any other hotel in Crete. Its 350 rooms, four swimming pools (one of Olympic size), two restaurants and three bars are located in this large area, leaving enough space for 12 tennis courts, a mini football pitch and a basketball court, amongst others offers something for all ages to enjoy.
